Key Match Events: Michael Lorenzen exited the game with a left hamstring strain after attempting to turn a double play at first base in the second inning, while the Royals were leading 2-0 against the AL Central-leading Cleveland Guardians.
Pre-Game Insights: Michael Lorenzen had a 1.99 earned run average over his first four starts in a Royals uniform.
Post-Match Reflections: It remains to be seen if Lorenzen will require a stint on the injured list following his departure from Tuesday's game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals attempted to take the AL Central lead, but Lorenzen's injury may impact their chances.
